intro: Design. Serve. Expand. Become the ultimate tavern owner.
description:
Welcome to Tavern Owner Simulator, where your dream of managing a medieval pub becomes reality. Step into the shoes of a tavern proprietor and transform a modest establishment into the most popular spot in town. With a mix of strategic planning, creative design, and savvy management, you’ll turn your tiny tavern into a bustling hub of activity.

Features:
- Build and Customize: Design your dream tavern from the ground up. Choose from a variety of architectural styles, layouts, and decorations to create a unique atmosphere that attracts customers.
- Manage Your Staff: Hire and train a team of skilled workers to handle everything from serving drinks to preparing delicious meals. Ensure your staff is well-equipped and motivated to provide excellent service.
- Attract Customers: Offer a diverse menu of food and drinks to cater to the tastes of your patrons. Create a welcoming ambiance with live music, entertainment, and special events.
- Grow Your Business: Expand your tavern to accommodate more customers and offer additional services. Invest in upgrades, renovations, and new features to keep your business thriving.
- Manage Finances: Carefully track your income and expenses to ensure your tavern remains profitable. Make strategic decisions about pricing, promotions, and investments.
- Experience Medieval Life: Immerse yourself in the rich world of the Middle Ages. Interact with historical characters, participate in local events, and experience the challenges and rewards of tavern ownership.

Embark on your journey to build the ultimate tavern and make your mark in the medieval world!
